Description:
We arrive at the human outpost. Leading the army is Queen Amelia herself, along with a small group of extraordinary war machines.

Sentinels they call them, and just the sight of them made us all shudder. It is said that the Queen has built them based on dwarven models and that she now controls them thanks to her great magical power.

As we were about to leave, the Queen tells us:
DescriptionAction: (Amelia) "Take one of these with you. They are a force to be reckoned with and will cut through anything."
